title: The extravagant spend-thrift, or, Wit dearly bought. For what he spent he did repent, when he beheld his grief, to end the strife, his loving wife, afforded him releif [sic]. To an excellent new tune. This may be printed R.P.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J[ohn]. Back, at the Black Boy, on London-Bridge,
